statements: SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts;
SELECT chat_id, user_id, chat_date FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY chat_date DESC;
SELECT chat_text FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE chat_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT chat_id, chat_text FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY chat_id ASC;
SELECT chat_id, user_id, chat_date, chat_text FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT chat_date, chat_text FROM chat_transcripts WHERE chat_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT chat_id, user_id, chat_text FROM chat_transcripts WHERE chat_text LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY chat_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(chat_id) AS chat_count FROM chat_transcripts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(chat_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message, chat_timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY chat_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_transcripts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(duration) AS avg_call_duration FROM video_call_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY chat_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE message LIKE '%important%' AND id < 1000;
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE chat_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS messages_count FROM chat_transcripts GROUP BY user_id HAVING messages_count > 50;
SELECT user_id, AVG(duration) AS avg_duration FROM video_call_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ChatTranscripts ORDER BY chat_datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT chat_id, user_id FROM ChatTranscripts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT chat_message FROM ChatTranscripts WHERE chat_datetime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM VideoCallLogs WHERE call_type = 'incoming' ORDER BY call_datetime ASC;
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_type, consultation_notes FROM ConsultationDetails ORDER BY consultation_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChatTranscripts ORDER BY chat_datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT chat_id, user_id, chat_message FROM ChatTranscripts WHERE user_id = '123456789' AND chat_datetime > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_chats FROM ChatTranscripts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_chats DESC;
SELECT * FROM VideoCallLogs WHERE call_datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY call_duration DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_type, consultation_notes FROM ConsultationDetails WHERE user_id = '987654321';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT chat_id, chat_text FROM chat_transcripts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, call_duration FROM video_call_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, user_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM consultation_details WHERE user_id = '98765432-abcdef-1234-5678-abcdef123456';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts;
SELECT user_id, chat_text FROM chat_transcripts WHERE chat_text ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT chat_id, timestamp FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, call_type FROM video_call_logs WHERE call_type IN ('audio', 'video') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT consultant_id, consultant_name, expertise_area FROM consultants ORDER BY consultant_name DESC;
SELECT transcript_text, transcript_date FROM chat_transcripts WHERE transcript_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT call_log_id, user_id, consultant_id, call_date, call_duration FROM video_call_logs WHERE call_type = 'incoming';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE transcript_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transcript_text, transcript_date FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = '123456' AND consultant_id = '987654';
SELECT user_id, consultant_id, COUNT(*) FROM chat_transcripts GROUP BY user_id, consultant_id;
SELECT u.username, c.consultant_name, co.consultation_date FROM users u JOIN consultants c ON u.user_id = c.consultant_id JOIN consultations co ON u.user_id = co.user_id;
SELECT call_log_id, user_id, consultant_id, call_date FROM video_call_logs WHERE call_type = 'Incoming' ORDER BY call_date DESC LIMIT 10;
